subject: Approval regarding requiremnt of crane;mechanized broomer/dust sucker vehicle in O&M contracts and release of 75% payment for variation in BOQ items and provision of GPS and GIS.
text: 9TRr refmv TTMHT nfarrvt {414 /Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200 (a 4TT, 18q Ata67t 3 rrotarf TAT4) 4R Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India WTT. !Extn: = 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 01-5 Ua 6, 4927-10, ERV, Tf farri-110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka New Delhi-110075 No.110417218/7007-Admn: 1st August 2008 POLICY MATTERS TECHNICAL (15/2008) Decision taken in the 23rd Weekly Meeting held on 11.06.2008 Consequent upon the discussions held in the 23rd Weekly Meeting and with the approval of Competent Authority, following have been decided: (i) The requirement of 30 Ton crane under 0 & M Contracts should be included in the scope of requirement but this shall be  only on specific need based requisition_ The response time for the same is to be provided for in the contract: (ii) The provision of mechanized broomer/dust sucker vehicle is to be provided in the bid document of 0 & M contracts for the cleaning of roads. (Iii) Release of 75% of payment for variation in BOQ items only for which technical approval has already been accorded: (iv) The provision of GPS and GIS for vehicle tracking system only for patrol vehicles is to be included in the bid document of 0 & M contracts. 0 g (V.K, Sharma) General Marager (Admn) to PS to Chairman PS/PA to all Members AII CGMscvo GMs/DGMs/Managers All PIUs/CMUs/SPVs also to LibrarianHindi Officer HT 7 & H NHAL Copy AI Copy
